Description: Rim sherd of Chian, possibly Simple Animal Style, pottery chalice; streaky white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below with two added red bands; top of lip glazed; exterior: band of alternating billets and dotted squares; two lines below.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0988) (phase 2)
